commit_list.message: Total overhaul of the medal updates. No longer requires 1 select per medal, now it all happens at once and we just do 1 update or insert per medal. Works wonderfully. Cleaned up the code a little bit too and added some comments. Also added a method for checking if a user has played halo 3 since the last time they updated in preparation for nightly updates of the gamertags. ALSO (yes, I know I should have done this all in more than 1 commit) switched the front_page and career local variables to instance variables so that I still only need to fetch the pages once.
commit_list.repo_description: Rails plugin for fetching Halo 3 Information (Not quite ready for public consumption. Use at your own risk)

commit_list.message:
Layouts overhaul (#146)

* Updated json to be cover just about every element on the screen.

* Reworked all of the renderers to use the new layout methods to get font and coords

* Added a font cache so we don't load from the disk every frame

* Bail on KeyboardInterupt so you can't have to keep hitting ctrl+c to exit

* Fixed a crash when setting the layout state

* Update the ledcoords README

* More updates to the README

* Added matrix width and height to startup string

* Ignore any custom fonts outside of the default font

* Update README to describe custom fonts
commit_list.repo_description: An LED scoreboard for Major League Baseball

repo_list.description: Instantly create a simple signup page for TestFlight beta testers
Colloquy CTCP Sounds
Automatic Movie Downloading via NZBs & Torrents
The GitHub Matrix
A plugin for Rails that allows you to create friend relationships without the need of 2 friendship rows in their table. (Hasn't been updated in a long time.)
A native iOS client to map the Pokemon around you!
:point_up_2: Convenient UITableViewCell subclass that implements a swippable content to trigger actions (similar to the Mailbox app).
Pull your old Mephisto blog and publish it to Tumblr automagically!
Mephisto liquid plugin that allows you to post dynamic content on your blog without hanging the page load if the external data is slow
Mephisto liquid plugin that displays time in an English form relative to the current time (i.e. 3 hours ago, 2 days ago)
Mephisto liquid plugin. A cheap and quick port of the last.fm liquid plugin for twitter.
A Python API to retrieve and read MLB GameDay data
An emoji keyboard app that exposes the extra 330+ new hidden emojis from iOS 5.1. Requires iOS 5.1+.
tvOS controls and extensions that add parallax effect to your application.
Peek and Pop with backwards-compatibility
▶️ video player in Swift, simple way to play and stream media on iOS/tvOS
Player View is a delegated view using AVPlayer of Swift
Sinatra callback server for listening for PokemonGo-Map webhooks and sending them to IFTTT for notifications
Rails plugin for fetching Halo 3 Information (Not quite ready for public consumption. Use at your own risk)
Halo 3 and Halo Reach stats from bungie.net
An easy-to-use UITableViewCell subclass that implements a swippable content view which exposes utility buttons (similar to iOS 7 Mail Application)
Port of the Skittlish theme for Trac. (Not updated in a while! Don't know if it still works!)
A remote monitoring application using Node.js, MongoDB, and Twitter Bootstrap.
An application template for Xcode with the very very basics for a cocos2d engine based iPhone game.
